bugs.summary: Remove or update some media probes expiring in Firefox 88
Move `browser_decoderDoctor.js` to `dom/media/doctor`
MediaSource.prototype.onsourceclosed event handler attribute typo (trailing d)

Intermittent css-valuesandunits/unit-vh-vw-overflow-auto.html == css-valuesandunits/unit-vh-vw-overflow-auto-ref.html | image comparison, max difference: 1, number of differing pixels: 29
Remove focus-visible feature flag
Unlock fission.autostart pref on Beta and DevEdition
Crash in [@ mozilla::dom::WindowContext::HasValidTransientUserGestureActivation]
Reject javascript: requests targeting other content processes
Removing iframes should update history.length
Make wpt pointerevents/pointerevent_mouse_capture_change_hover.html pass

Update libpixman to release 0.4.0

Leftover lines under menu items after hovering in the new AppMenu.
Remove integer comparison workaround in fetch_clip_area.
Improve opacity flattening
Add a code path for batched texture uploads via glTexImage2D

Compositor telemetry reporting should report different SW-WR compositor implementations
Allow WebRender on Nouveau in early beta.
Implement GL_KHR_blend_equation_advanced in swgl
Drop the minimum mesa version to 17.
Add some missing gen9 ids.
Fallback to Software WebRender does extra pass if SW-WR + D3D11 is disabled
Enable WebRender on some gen4.5 in nightly/early beta.
Remove workaroud in brush_vs.
Remove integer comparison workaround in fetch_glyph.
Remove YUV workaround.

load of value 65025, which is not a valid value for type 'mozilla::widget::InputContextAction::Cause'

Audit JSAPI and add jsapi-tests for large ArrayBuffers

Optimize object literal instantiation
Properly use CompilationState storage while building up stencil vectors
ReportTooBigCharacter's buffer is too small
Remove off_thread_parse_global preference
Use scalar replacement to optimize the arguments object in Warp
Add "MIR optimizations from a thousand feet" to source-docs
Exception handling
nsBidiPresUtils.cpp: do not use 'else' after 'break'

we want to fallback to TCP faster when Http3 with 0rtt is used
don't request a repaint if it's the first time for an apzc getting metrics (regression from bug 1662013)

Simplify QuotaManager::CleanupTemporaryStorage

Add nightmode theme for about:webrtc

Allow to limit log file size when using MOZ_LOG=append,...
Fix clang-tidy warnings in Printf.cpp

Implement breakpoints listening via the ResourceWatcher API on the actor side
